page.title: 08A DAY AT PUTTENHAM SCHOOL
page.content: I wake at half past six when I feel footsteps running across my bed.I don't need an alarm clock because my kittens wake me.I quickly get out of bed,put on my blue and white school dress and run down to the dining room for my breakfast of cornflakes and toast.After brushing my teeth and packing my swimming kit I am driven to school by car.When the bell rings and we have been marked on the register we are ready to go by coach to the swimming pool.When we return to school we have milk and apples before playtime.After an hour of Maths it is time for lunch and then we play games, such as "Grandmother's footsteps." During the afternoon I paint and do English before going home. After tea I read, collect my sister from school and play with the kittens before going to bed at half past seven.{KATIE.
